3.1.3 Comprehensive Abortion Care
3.1.3.1 CHO should identify women who need the services for medical or surgical termination of pregnancy 
and refer them to appropriate higher centre.
3.2 Back referral from PHC, CHC, DH/MC. 
3.2.1 CHO should ensure that all the pregnant women who were referred to a higher centre should be back
